locations.content: Maryland Heights Community Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: My husband and I feel so lucky to have this excellent community center so close to home!  Very clean, bright, and spacious, with a comprehensive fitness area, indoor pool, indoor track, senior center, and excellent teachers for  class offerings.  And to top it off, the staff is incredibly helpful and friendly!
I normally swim and the pool is good and the changing area is excellent. Showers are great with a changing area and a showering area. Always hot water.

Their new renovation is great.  I haven’t been here in a while but fell in love with it once I entered for a grad party.  Was truly blow always by how well done, clean, and professional it looked.  Very well done - so modern!!!  Highly recommend a visit to this wonderful recreation center!

So glad to have found this community center. I've been exercising here since 2019 and appreciate the friendly workers and all of the exercise equipment and facilities. Have recommended to friends that joined and enjoy exercising here also. Big thanks to all the employees that work there!

showerReviews.reviewText: Good place to keep fit in very friendly atmosphere. It is kept clean and tidy all day long. Some facilities need to be renewed and upgraded especially showers and bathroom area. The hot top should be a little bigger and renovated. The staffs are excellent with friendly attitude.

I just left the Pointe and there was a dead rabbit on the walkway next to the circle drive.  When I walked in to inform the front desk, I was looked at like I was speaking a foreign language. I figured someone would want to clean it up before the parents had to explain why Thumper was lying dead on their way to swim lessons.
Thirty years later this place is still clean and pristine; definitely worth the membership or even a day pass! Thank you staff and city of Ballwin for keeping this place up and running.

showerReviews.reviewText: Steam room is horrible - I get more steam leaving my shower on hot inside my own bathroom. It comes on for only  2 minutes tops and then you have to wait 10 minutes or longer for it to come back on. The sauna has a nice temp around 180 but …
Probably the nicest and cleanest indoor pool ive ever been too. The individual family shower rooms and outdoor pool are incredibly nice too.

showerReviews.reviewText: I was at the Rec Center for a baby shower in one of the party rooms. The facility was nice. I have been in the same party room for 2 parties and both times the temperature in the room was too hot. The parking lot was a mess when I was there …

We were there throwing a baby shower in the community room, and it was a nice place! We were a little disappointed that there were a couple unnecessary things being stored in the room that we booked, but overall it was really awesome!
Attended baby shower there. It was nice enough. They had a kitchen area to prepare food. Fridge and I think ice machine.
